cards.title: Attention
body: At the end of the environment turn, reveal the top card of each deck in turn order, starting with the villain deck. If the revealed card is a target, put it into play. Otherwise, shuffle it back into its deck. Then, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “That's the kind of thing you're supposed to{BR}inform us of well in advance,” Grue hissed at{BR}her. “And there's not supposed to be six of them.”

cards.title: Civilians
body: At the start of the environment turn, each player may discard 1 card each to destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: “Low blow, Dragon,” I said, finally.{BR}“Outing me? I thought you were better than{BR}that.”

cards.title: Leet
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the lowest HP 2 lightning damage.
If [i]Uber[/i] is in play, increase damage dealt by [i]Uber[/i] and [i]Leet[/i] by 1.

cards.title: PRT Squad
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the lowest HP 2 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: Their very recognizable uniforms were chain{BR}mesh augmented with kevlar, topped with{BR}faceless helmets. The only means you had to{BR}identify them with were the badge numbers.

cards.title: Rooftops
body: At the end of their turn, a player may discard 2 cards to destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: I could just imagine the flames igniting the{BR}rooftop, and just how little I'd be able to{BR}do if it happened.

cards.title: Scum
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the second highest HP X projectile damage, where X is 2 times the number of Scum in play.
cards.flavorText: Some had their faces exposed, others wore{BR}kerchiefs over the lower halves of their{BR}faces. One had a bandanna folded so it{BR}covered one eye. She couldn't think straight.

cards.title: The Boardwalk
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Suburb cards.
Reduce damage dealt to environment targets by 1.
cards.flavorText: There were shops that sold dresses for over{BR}a thousand dollars, cafes with ludicrously{BR}expensive coffees and stretches of wooden{BR}walkways

cards.title: The Docks
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Suburb cards.
Increase damage dealt by environment targets by 1.
cards.flavorText: Even on my runs, I had scrupulously stayed{BR}on the Boardwalk and avoided the bad part of{BR}town. Now it was Sunday night and I was in{BR}costume and breaking the rules.

cards.title: The Outskirts
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Suburb cards.
At the end of the environment turn, play the top card of the environment deck.
cards.flavorText: “The howling. If you can hear the howling,{BR}you're too fucking close. Leave.”

cards.title: Uber
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the highest HP 2 melee damage. Then, if [i]Leet[/i] is in play, [i]Uber[/i] and [i]Leet[/i] each regain 1 HP.
cards.flavorText: “Uber and Leet. I can't tell you two how{BR}relieved I am. For a few seconds, I thought{BR}we had something to be worried about.”
